member.name: M:SmartDocs.Controllers.HomeController.Choices
member.summary: Shows the "Choices" view.
member.remarks: This method shows the "Choices" landing page. It first checks the method to ensure the user is known to the application. If the user's LDAP name is not in the "Users" table, the repo method will return "null" and the user will be redirected to the "Access Denied" view.

member.name: M:SmartDocs.Controllers.HomeController.About
member.summary: Shows the "About" view.
member.remarks: This view shows the FAQ, help file link, and admin contact info.

member.summary: Shows the "Access Denied" view.
member.remarks: This view shows the user a message generic "not authorized" message.

member.name: M:SmartDocs.Controllers.HomeController.NotAuthorized
member.summary: View that is returned when a user attempts an action for which they are not authorized.

member.name: M:SmartDocs.Models.SmartDocumentRepository.SaveJob(SmartDocs.Models.SmartJob)
member.summary: Saves/Updates the .
member.remarks: If this method is passed a SmartJob with a non-zero SmartJob.JobId, it will update the corresponding SmartJob in the repo. If this method is passed a SmartJob with a SmartJob.JobId = 0, then it will create a new SmartJob in the repo.

member.name: M:SmartDocs.Models.SmartDocumentRepository.RemoveJob(SmartDocs.Models.SmartJob)
member.summary: Removes the from the repo.

member.summary: Saves/Updates a
member.remarks: If this method is passed a SmartTemplate with a non-zero SmartTemplate.TemplateId, it will update the corresponding SmartTemplate in the repo. If this method is passed a SmartJob with a SmartTemplate.TemplateId = 0, then it will create a new SmartTemplate in the repo.

member.summary: Saves/Updates a the user.
member.remarks: If this method is passed a SmartUser with a non-zero SmartUser.UserId, it will update the corresponding SmartUser in the repo. If this method is passed a SmartUser with a SmartUser.UserId = 0, then it will create a new SmartUser in the repo.

member.remarks: If this method is passed a SmartUser with a non-zero OrganizationComponent.ComponentId, it will update the corresponding OrganizationComponent in the repo.
